products.title: V-Neck Sleeveless Vest Top
products.description: With a seamless design, this v-neck vest top from our Goodmove collection was made for ultimate comfort. This tight fitted style features an inner shelf for light support when exercising. Plus, its breathable fabric is both moisture-wicking and quick-drying, working hard to keep you feeling fresh.

products.title: Floral Short Sleeve Midi Shirt Dress
products.description: This pure cotton leopard print dress is perfect for everyday wear. Designed in an easy regular fit, with a round neck and cosy long sleeves. Features a waist seam and a pretty, gently flared skirt. Finished with a fun all-over leopard print. Made with organic cotton. All of the cotton for our clothing is sustainably sourced and always will be.

products.title: Floral Square Neck Bikini Top
products.description: With a dreamy floral print and dainty finishing touches, this Per Una dress has a gloriously romantic feel. Flattering midi length with a V-neck and feminine fitted waist. Pretty flutter trim to the fluted sleeves and deep frill at the hem. Crafted from sustainably derived viscose.

products.title: Flexifit™ Lounge Hoodie
products.description: Get ready for the Great British summertime in this floral dress. Cut in a classic regular fit, this midaxi-length dress features a thin tie belt for a waist-cinching effect. Its flattering silhouette is topped off with 3/4 length sleeves and a tiered hem. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

products.title: Printed V-Neck Short Sleeve Tunic
products.description: Add a classic US college look to your casual wardrobe with this pure cotton sweatshirt. Comfy regular fit. Embroidered slogan reads 'Long Valley mountain view', with mountain graphic. All of the cotton for our clothing is sustainably sourced and always will be. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

products.title: Plain V-Neck Sleeveless Shell Top
products.description: Add a classic US college look to your casual wardrobe with this pure cotton sweatshirt. Comfy regular fit. Embroidered slogan reads 'Long Valley mountain view', with mountain graphic. All of the cotton for our clothing is sustainably sourced and always will be. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

products.title: Printed V-Neck Short Sleeve Tunic
products.description:
Say hello to your new floral midaxi dress. Cut in a regular fit, it features a tie waist for an ultra-flattering silhouette. The sleeves finish at a 3/4 length with elasticated cuffs, while the matching fabric buttons underneath the round neckline give a truly classic finish.
M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

products.title: Scoop Neck Knitted Top
products.description: Feel like you're by the seaside in this printed dress from the M&S X GHOST collaboration. Designed in a regular fit, this midi-length piece is packed with flattering detailing. Its classic tea silhouette has an empire line for a high-waisted effect. A v-neck and short angel sleeves give a traditional finish. Side zip fastening.

products.title: Floral V-Neck Flutter Sleeve Top
products.description:
With its smooth satin fabric and all-over polka dots, this tea dress is all about timeless elegance. It's cut to a regular fit with a flowy midaxi-length skirt. A fixed tie front belt lets you draw in the waist for a truly flattering shape. 
 M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

products.title: Pure Cotton Broderie V-Neck Blouse
products.description:
All-over florals and a swishy swing silhouette lend a playful feel to this knee-length dress. It's cut in a comfy regular fit, with a collared neckline and button-through front for a smart touch. The 3/4 length sleeves are pleated at the cuffs for added volume. Made with sustainably sourced viscose. 
M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.
